Biliary tract scar stricture is the complicated and intractable difficult problem of biliary tract surgery.
胆管瘢痕狭窄是胆道外科复杂而棘手的难题.
Urinary tract infection. Recurrent urinary tract infections are a problem for many postmenopausal women.
尿路感染. 复发性尿路感染是许多绝经后妇女的一个问题.
UTI is an infection of the lower urinary tract , the upper urinary tract, or both.
泌尿道感染是下泌尿道, 上泌尿道或是两者皆感染.
Highstand System Tract mainly develops depositional system of offshore - meare, fluvial facies and prograded delta.
高位体系域主要发育滨浅湖相 、 河流相及进积型三角洲沉积体系.
General practitioners often prescribe antibiotics for respiratory tract infections when nasal discharge is purulent.
一般的医生都用抗生素治疗呼吸道感染引起的脓鼻涕.
